meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one trillionth of a second.
meanings.sent1: She measured the duration of the event in zeptoseconds.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use zeptoseconds to study extremely fast processes.
meanings.sent3: The snail crossed the finish line in zeptoseconds, winning the race.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down to zeptoseconds as the car skidded off the road.
meanings.sent5: The heartbeat of a hummingbird can be as fast as zeptoseconds.

meanings.definition: The smallest unit of time measurement.
meanings.sent1: In the world of physics, zeptoseconds are crucial for precise calculations.
meanings.sent2: The stopwatch could measure time intervals down to zeptoseconds.
meanings.sent3: The chef's recipe required timing down to the zeptoseconds for perfection.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was wearing thin, each moment feeling like zeptoseconds.
meanings.sent5: The suspense in the room stretched out to zeptoseconds before the winner was announced.
